title: Rakan Jungle
body:
Ever since Rakan was released I have always loved the idea of taking him jungle. After the 8.5 buffs he's a tiny bit closer to it being viable. 
Riot has been recently talking about wanting to let champs have a little more freedom in where they go, and they want xayah and rakan to be viable without each other. 
So make rakan be able to proc his heal off jungle creeps and give his w bonus damage to jungle creeps or a little better ap scaling. 
Or devise an item that opens the door for support junglers. 
That'd make my day.
